verbose_text: (I) Renal interstitial fibrosis continued presence of renal tissue hypoxia and lead to elevated adenosine levels within the organization; (II) the increased adenosine profile accelerated the renal tubular injury and the occurrence and development of interstitial fibrosis; (III) the adenosine signaling pathway can mediate the development of RIF by regulating the expression of the mRNA of TGF-beta1, alpha1 (I) procollagen.
evidence: adenosine signaling pathway can mediate the development of RIF
